meanings.definition: The property of a material exhibiting both viscous and elastic characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The viscoelasticities of the rubber band allowed it to stretch and return to its original shape.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are researching the viscoelasticities of various polymers to improve product durability.
meanings.sent3: The silly putty demonstrated its viscoelasticities by bouncing off the wall and then slowly oozing down.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was like the viscoelasticities of a rubber band, able to withstand pressure and bounce back.
meanings.sent5: The viscoelasticities of the memory foam mattress made it comfortable yet supportive.

meanings.definition: The study of the behavior of materials that exhibit both viscous and elastic properties.
meanings.sent1: In her viscoelasticities class, she learned about the unique properties of certain materials.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in the field of viscoelasticities aim to understand how materials deform over time.
meanings.sent3: The viscoelasticities lecture was so interesting that even the most tired students perked up.
meanings.sent4: The field of viscoelasticities is like solving a puzzle where materials behave in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent5: Studying viscoelasticities helps engineers design more durable and flexible products.
